content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) for extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -82.5) for storing extracted coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) as an additional storage unit.
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) for transferring items from the chest at (56.5, -83.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (56.5, -83.5) for storing items transferred by the inserter.

### Transport Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup connecting various positions for transporting coal and other materials.
  - Belt from (50.5, -86.5) to (48.5, -86.5) in the LEFT direction.
  - Belt from (49.5, -86.5) to (47.5, -86.5) in the LEFT direction.
  - Belt from (43.5, -84.5) to (45.5, -84.5) in the RIGHT direction.
  - Belt from (45.5, -85.5) to (47.5, -85.5) in the RIGHT direction.
  - Belt from (52.5, -83.5) to (52.5, -85.5) in the UP direction.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Chest Full Warning
- Regularly check and empty the chest at position (40.5, -82.5) to prevent mining operations from halting due to full inventory.
